The government never committed to taking: 000 child refugees from Europe under the Dubs Amendment.
There was never an official target: although 3,000 was the number mentioned by campaigners, some of whom say they believed that to be the figure. The government only accepted the Dubs Amendment after the 3,000 target was taken out of it.
The government has been accused of accep: The Home Office announced on 8 February that 350 is the limit under the so-called ‘Dubs Amendment’ scheme.
